20101222033142.000|20101222033142.000|CC1|STRUGGLE.                       
20101222033142.000|20101222033145.000|CC1|>> I GREW UP IN AN              
20101222033145.000|20101222033146.000|CC1|UNDERPRIVILEGED FAMILY REALLY.  
20101222033146.000|20101222033149.000|CC1|MY DAD DIDN'T ALWAYS HAVE WORK. 
20101222033149.000|20101222033152.000|CC1|MY MOM COULDN'T WORK A LOT OF   
20101222033152.000|20101222033152.000|CC1|THE TIME BECAUSE THERE WERE FIVE
20101222033152.000|20101222033154.000|CC1|KIDS IN OUR FAMILY.             
20101222033154.000|20101222033156.000|CC1|>> SHANIA TWAIN WAS BORN EILEEN 
20101222033156.000|20101222033159.000|CC1|REGINA EDWARDS IN WINDSOR,

20101222033210.000|20101222033212.000|CC1|GO GROCERY SHOPPING.            
20101222033212.000|20101222033214.000|CC1|AND, YOU KNOW, NO MONEY FOR     
20101222033214.000|20101222033217.000|CC1|LUNCHES, YOU KNOW, I WENT TO    
20101222033217.000|20101222033219.000|CC1|SCHOOL WITH SANDWICHES JUST TO  
20101222033219.000|20101222033221.000|CC1|BE ABLE TO SAY THAT I HAD

20101222033223.000|20101222033224.000|CC1|I WOULDN'T GET TEASED OR        
20101222033224.000|20101222033225.000|CC1|WHATEVER.                       
20101222033225.000|20101222033228.000|CC1|>>  THEN TRAGEDY STRUCK IN 1987.
20101222033228.000|20101222033230.000|CC1|SHANIA, THEN CALLED EILEEN, LOST
20101222033230.000|20101222033231.000|CC1|HER PARENTS IN A CAR ACCIDENT

20101222033234.000|20101222033235.000|CC1|SHE THEN RAISED HER THREE
